content.rendered:
Major Gift and Planned Giving

(Highest Giving Help)
Major Gifts
GEOKC Major Gifts are the essential part of GEOKC Campaigns and belong from specific reason to build the strong future. The specific reason to use the Major Gifts mostly related with the purpose of capital gifts to buying the land and constructing the new building of GEOKC. In general as unrestricted gifts Major Gifts fundraising program can also meet the needs of current operation including salaries, ongoing programs, utilities, maintenance and much more. For any of these reasons we always encourage our donors to keep in touch with our future goal to keep their names in our fundraising recognition programs to recognize them as our most popular prospects.

Major gifts are higher gifts than annual gifts and beyond, and typically fulfill a pledge made over several years. These types of gifts can be restricted or unrestricted and can come in many forms like cash, securities, stock transfers, etc.

Read More

Planned Giving
GEOKC Planned giving referred to as gift planning and is a great method of supporting that enables philanthropic individuals or donors to make larger gifts than they could make from their income. For example there are a variety of methods that can be considered as planned giving:

Cash Gifts
Cash Gifts are type of Major Gifts and can give immediately impact to programs and provide the choice to donor with the highest tax deduction.

Bequest
A bequest is a gift to a nonprofit or charity, made at the time of death. This is usually done through a will or trust and can include any asset including money, property, and investments.

Gift Annuities
Gift Annuity means where a donor makes a gift to the charity, and the charity provides fixed payments to the donor for life. So, a gift annuity is an agreement between a charity and a donor.

Life Insurance and Retirement Plans
Depending on philanthropic individuals or donors decision, nonprofits or charities can be named as beneficiaries on life insurance policies and retirement plans.

Read More

To finalize your Major Gifts and Planned Giving options, contact the GEOKC Campaigns Team (Team Three):
612-540-9651
batheja.sunita@gmail.com
